data.comment: The big names in today's match at Dignity Health Sports Park have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Allen Chapman, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 2, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
In Carson Los Angeles attack through Brian Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 3, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
In the minute 7, Los Angeles's Bradley Wright-Phillips is whistled for offside at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
Brian Rodriguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Los Angeles.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Los Angeles are coming forward and Brian Rodriguez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 13, Allen Chapman awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In Carson Los Angeles drive forward through Jose Cifuentes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 15, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bradley Wright-Phillips for Los Angeles drives towards goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Brian Rodriguez (Los Angeles) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 16, Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 19, Latif Blessing is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Carson.
In the minute 22, Perry Kitchen (LA Galaxy) gets a yellow card.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
In the minute 24, Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Los Angeles's half?
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 26, Los Angeles drive upfield and Diego Palacios gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a LA Galaxy defender.
Allen Chapman signals a Los Angeles throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Los Angeles's Jose Cifuentes gets in a shot on goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
In the minute 30, Los Angeles drives forward and Latif Blessing gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
LA Galaxy's Ethan Zubak breaks free at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 34, Los Angeles's Jose Cifuentes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
In the minute 35, Throw-in high up the field for Los Angeles in Carson.
Los Angeles are pushing forward but Diego Rossi's finish is wide of the goal.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
In Carson Los Angeles drive forward through Brian Rodriguez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
So close for Los Angeles as Bradley Wright-Phillips's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Dignity Health Sports Park.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 50, Allen Chapman awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Goal! Cristian Pavon gives LA Galaxy a 1-0 lead in Carson.
That's a fine assist from Emiliano Insua.
In the minute 53, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mark Anthony Kaye Los Angeles.
Cristian Pavon is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 55, Guillermo Schelotto is making the team's first substitution at Dignity Health Sports Park with Jonathan Dos Santos replacing Ethan Zubak.
Cristian Pavon returns to the field for LA Galaxy after picking up a slight injury.
Los Angeles needs to be cautious. LA Galaxy have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 57, Los Angeles push upfield but Allen Chapman quickly pulls them for offside.
Dejan Jakovic is replacing Bradley Wright-Phillips for Los Angeles at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to LA Galaxy's area.
In the minute 64, The away team have replaced Brian Rodriguez with Adrien Perez. This is the second substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
The away team replace Jose Cifuentes with Danny Musovski.
Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 66, LA Galaxy's Sebastian Lletget gets in a shot on goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Dignity Health Sports Park, LA Galaxy are penalized for being offside.
Los Angeles are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 70, Bob Bradley (Los Angeles) is making a fourth substitution, with Andy Najar replacing Eddie Segura.
Mohammed El Munir is replacing Diego Palacios for the away team.
Cristian Pavon for LA Galaxy drives towards goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal! LA Galaxy extend their lead to 2-0 through Sebastian Lletget.
In the minute 73, Cristian Pavon instrumental with a fine assist.
The home team have replaced Julian Araujo with Efrain Alvarez. This is the second substitution made today by Guillermo Schelotto.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 76, Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Los Angeles are caught offside.
In the minute 83, Goal! LA Galaxy extend their lead to 3-0 through Sebastian Lletget.
Rolf Feltscher with an assist there.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 86, Los Angeles's Diego Rossi misses with an attempt on goal.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
LA Galaxy make their fourth substitution with Emil Cuello replacing Sebastian Lletget.
In the minute 87, Cameron Dunbar is on a sub for Joe Corona for LA Galaxy.
Cristian Pavon of LA Galaxy gets in a strike, but is off target.
Allen Chapman awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Cristian Pavon (LA Galaxy) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
In Carson a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Adrien Perez for Los Angeles gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Carson.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Allen Chapman signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Carson. The final score is 3-0.
